mapper.sql: anaEventId, code, occurTime, docId, isSuccess, docType
mapper.select: select * from evt_anaesevent t where docId=#{docId} and code <#{code} and `code` in ('9','8','5','4','2','1') order by code DESC
select * from evt_anaesevent t where docId=#{docId} and code >#{code} and `code` in ('9','8','5','4','2','1') order by code ASC
select * from evt_anaesevent where code = #{code} and docId = #{docId}
select * from evt_anaesevent where code = #{code} and docId = #{docId}
mapper.delete: delete from evt_anaesevent where docId = #{docId} and code = #{code} and anaEventId= #{anaEventId}
delete from evt_anaesevent WHERE docId = #{anaesevent.docId} and code = #{anaesevent.code}
mapper.insert:
insert into evt_anaesevent
anaEventId,
code,
occurTime,
docId,
isSuccess,
docType,

mapper.update:
update evt_anaesevent
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
occurTime = #{occurTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isSuccess = #{isSuccess,jdbcType=INTEGER},
docType = #{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where anaEventId = #{anaEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update evt_anaesevent set code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, occurTime = #{occurTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSuccess = #{isSuccess,jdbcType=INTEGER}, docType = #{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where anaEventId = #{anaEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
